attributes.title: Resturants
description: In a luxuriant and quiet oasis, the Hotel Anis in Nice offers hospitality and culinary delights at the “L’Amour dans le Four” restaurant, open to the public, with gourmet meals in the best local culinary tradition.During the summer, outdoor dining at the Restaurant L’Amour dans le Four is a true pleasure. Our restaurant’s culinary style is further enhanced by the mild climate and relaxing outdoor atmosphere at the Hotel Anis: an ample terrace shaded by a large ficus and overlooking and overlooking a garden enveloped by a thousand different fragrances.
The restaurant is open from 12:00 to 2:30 PM and from 7:30 to 9:30 PM.
